column1: * 1925 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Mr Ashton.
* 1967 - Donald Swann and William Elvin record the music for The Road Goes Ever On (book).
* 2002 - The Art of The Fellowship of the Ring is published.
* 2007 - The fan film The Peril to the Shire premières to a private audience.
:There are no known events for this day.
